MUSIC, NATURALLY.\r\nStaffPad is a groundbreaking music notation application, featuring advanced handwriting recognition. Write music, using your digital pen*, and StaffPad will transform your handwritten notation into a beautifully typeset score which you can then edit, play back, print and share. For composers and musicians, StaffPad revolutionises the art of writing music.\r\n\r\n*IMPORTANT NOTE: STAFFPAD **REQUIRES** A DEVICE WITH ACTIVE PEN CAPABILITIES. DESIGNED FOR SURFACE.\r\n\r\nMUSIC RECOGNITION\r\nStaffPad has been designed from the ground up for pen input. Simply write your music straight on to the screen, using your device’s pen. As you move from bar to bar, StaffPad will convert your handwriting into a beautifully engraved score. You can draw notes, beams, stems, articulations, accidentals, slurs, ties and more. It’s the most natural way to write music on digital device, ever.\r\n\r\nAN ORCHESTRA IN THE TIP OF YOUR PEN\r\nStaffPad contains a bespoke playback engine, and an entire orchestra which has been meticulously recorded and programmed to play back your score with incredible realism. Multiple dynamics layers, multiple recorded articulations, repetition samples and smart playback rules ensure that what you see is what you hear. The entire symphony orchestra is represented, and more instruments are available to purchase from the in-app store.\r\n\r\nStaffPad is powerful. Everything from a basic piano lead sheet to a full symphony score can be written with StaffPad.\r\n\r\nA BEAUTIFUL EXPERIENCE\r\nWriting music should be the focus of a composer. StaffPad handles everything else for you whilst you work. The interface has been designed to reduce clutter, and is context sensitive - showing only the information you want, when you want it.\r\n\r\nPEN AND TOUCH\r\nBy combining the power of digital inking and multitouch, we can offer a no-compromises approach to virtual manuscript. Use your finger to move around the score, and pinch to zoom - with butter-smooth scrolling. When you want to write music, just use the pen. Use your eraser button on the pen to remove both ink strokes and existing notation. You can also draw freehand on the score, using the sketch layer, to quickly brainstorm and leave notes/comments for yourself and others.\r\n\r\nPRINT YOUR RESULTS\r\nStaffPad will intelligently layout the score when it’s time to print. You can print the entire score, as well as individual parts for each musician. StaffPad has smart collision avoidance and music layout rules which handle the reflowing of the music to a page-based layout automatically.\r\n\r\nSHARE YOUR WORK\r\nStaffPad allows you to easily share and export your work. You can export MIDI and MusicXML, should you wish to continue working on your score in other programs. You can also export your score to MP3/WAV format, or quickly email an MP3 of your work in just a couple of taps. StaffPad also supports import of MusicXML and MIDI files.\r\n\r\nSCORE SYNC AND AUTO-SAVE\r\nStaffPad is always saving your score, and keeping track of versions - which you can return to at anytime. By saving your scores to OneDrive, you can ensure that your scores are kept in sync across all your devices. StaffPad also syncs your settings and preferences. You can also organise your scores into ‘collections’, meaning that your scores and projects stay neatly organised, for easy access. You can even pin frequently accessed scores straight to the Start Screen.\r\n\r\nCOMPOSER ASSISTANT\r\nA voice activated composer assistant allows you to interact with your score using your voice. Want to change the key signature to G major at bar 10? No problem - tap the assistant and say \"Change to G major at bar 10\". The assistant can quickly help you set up your score, adding instruments, setting the tempo, the key signature, the time signature, adding barlines, playing from rehearsal marks or specific bars, printing, exporting and transposing your score. Currently, the voice assistant is available in US and UK English only.\r\n\r\nEXPRESS YOURSELF\r\nStaffPad is the first notation application which allows you to easily draw dynamics/music expression data right onto the staff. By toggling the expression layer, you can elegantly draw in additional dynamics detail, which can enhance the realism of playback without compromising the existing dynamics markings on your score.\r\n\r\nPROFESSIONAL FEATURES\r\nStaffPad intelligently handles transposing instruments, allowing you to write in concert pitch and toggle to transposing when you’re ready, or when printing. You can write music in multiple voices, transpose selections, reverse stem directions, quickly repeat bars and insert text intuitively via the  quick input tiles. Quick symbols provide the easiest way to enter trills, tremolos, fermatas, rehearsal marks, pedal markings, hairpins and much more.\r\n\r\nEDUCATION\r\nStaffPad is designed for professional composers and musicians, but it’s also a great learning tool for students. Within the application there are multiple video tutorials explaining how to use the app, and key musical concepts. \r\n\r\nCOMPATIBILITY:\r\nStaffPad REQUIRES a device with a digital pen (also known as an active digitiser) and multitouch capabilities in order to function as designed*. If your device does not support pen and touch, the app will not function correctly. Support will not be available to users attempting to run StaffPad on an incompatible device.\r\n\r\n*StaffPad has been designed for Surface 3, Surface Pro 3 and Surface Pro 4.","ProductFamilyName":"Apps","Schema":"Card;1"},{"$type":"Microsoft.Marketplace.Storefront.Contracts.V8.One.CardModel, Microsoft.Marketplace.Storefront.Contracts","ProductId":"9NXR6469DM2P","TileLayout":"Poster","Title":"Crackdown 3","Images":[{"$type":"Microsoft.Marketplace.Storefront.Contracts.V2.ImageItem, Microsoft.Marketplace.Storefront.Contracts","ImageType":"BoxArt","Url":"http://store-images.s-microsoft.com/image/apps.63949.14494915233617130.8bc2d647-9563-4ed3-9081-f4a771cfa3a6.6504c19a-15a5-40a6-9231-343598749956","Height":2160,"Width":2160,"BackgroundColor":"#FFFFFF","ForegroundColor":"#FFFFFF","Caption":"","ImagePositionInfo":""},{"$type":"Microsoft.Marketplace.Storefront.Contracts.V2.ImageItem, Microsoft.Marketplace.Storefront.Contracts","ImageType":"Poster","Url":"http://store-images.s-microsoft.com/image/apps.24344.14494915233617130.8bc2d647-9563-4ed3-9081-f4a771cfa3a6.876524bb-291a-4484-8f20-fcef8017b53c","Height":2160,"Width":1440,"BackgroundColor":"#FFFFFF","ForegroundColor":"#FFFFFF","Caption":"","ImagePositionInfo":""}],"StrikethroughPrice":"","DisplayPrice":"Inclus⁺","Price":0.0,"AverageRating":3.7,"RatingsCount":"3","SubscriptionDiscountMessageTemplate":"avec {0}","PackageFamilyNames":[""],"ContentIds":[],"GamingOptionsXboxLive":false,"PlaintextPassName":"Xbox Game Pass","GlyphTextPassName":"StoreGlyphXboxGamePassInline","AvailableDevicesDisplayText":" ","AvailableDevicesNarratorText":"PC,Xbox One","TypeTag":"app","RecommendationReason":"","LongDescription":"Ça va saigner ! Pensez également à aménager une argilière et une fabrique de lianes afin de produire les matériaux nécessaires à la construction de vos abris. Dénichez des plantes rarissimes pour concocter des potions magiques et restez sur le qui-vive lorsque vous partez en exploration.\r\nMais il ne suffit pas d’éviter les dangers, de vous protéger des éléments et de bien vous nourrir. Pour échapper à cet île et retrouver la voie de la civilisation, il vous faudra déchiffrer des inscriptions cabalistiques gravées à même le sol, trouver des statues ancestrales, terrasser un redoutable crabe mutant et percer les terribles secrets de cette île des plus mystérieuses ! Bonne chance !\r\n\r\nCe jeu est absolument gratuit, mais vous avez la possibilité de débloquer des bonus optionnels en effectuant des achats intégrés depuis l’interface du jeu. Vous pouvez désactiver les achats intégrés dans les paramètres de votre appareil.\r\n\r\n● Une magnifique île tropicale à explorer\r\n● Plus de 1000 quêtes périlleuses à mener à bien\r\n● 40 types de ressources à préparer et à entreposer\r\n● 33 personnages pittoresques et attachants à découvrir\r\n● 28 délicieux mets indigènes à maîtriser\r\n● 5 potions magiques à concocter : protection, transfert, vitesse, immortalité et défense contre les esprits\r\n● 11 exploitations à construire : des élevages de poissons, de crabes, de cailles, de béliers et de sangliers, ainsi qu'une scierie, une argilière, une fabrique de lianes, une carrière, une usine de bâtons et des élevages d'anguilles\r\n● Collections de trophées et de statues à rassembler\r\n____________________________\r\n\r\nJeu \r\n\r\nFree functionality \r\n• Unlimited playback of on-device video and photos. \r\n• Fling unlimited photos and videos from your Plex Media Server (available for free at https://plex.tv/downloads) and the Camera Roll on your phone or tablet to other supported Plex apps, such as Roku, Android TV, Fire TV, Xbox One, and other apps.\r\n\r\nLimitations of the free app \r\n• Playing media from your Plex Media Server on the device running this app is limited (one minute for music and video, watermark on photos) until the app is unlocked. \r\n\r\nUnlock full functionality \r\n• Unlock unlimited streaming to your Windows device with a Plex Pass subscription that includes many other premium features (available at https://plex.tv/plexpass) -OR- a small one-time in-app purchase. \r\n\r\nHere are some ways that Plex makes your media experience awesome:\r\n• Makes your media beautiful with artwork, descriptions, and more\r\n• Automatically converts your media on-the-fly to play on any device\r\n• Makes sharing your media with friends and family simple and easy\r\n• Plex Pass feature: Sync media to your phone or tablet for offline viewing. \r\n• Plex Pass feature: Sync media to your favorite cloud provider including Google Drive, Dropbox, and Box, so you can stream media even when your server is offline. \r\n• Plex Pass feature: Online Trailers and Extras for the movies in your collection! La compétition sera rude, alors restez au top !\r\n\r\n• LE MONDE EST VOTRE CIRCUIT : courez dans des endroits exotiques du monde entier, comme les glaciers de Svalbard, les dunes de la vallée du Nil, les jungles luxuriantes de Phuket en Thaïlande, les aciéries de Détroit et bien plus.\r\n\r\n• PERSONNALISEZ VOTRE BOLIDE : vous voulez augmenter la puissance de votre voiture ? Imaginez que vous pouvez lire, diffuser, et enregistrer des contenus multimédia en même temps.\r\n\r\nCasting\r\n---------\r\nAvec Duplex Media Player, la diffusion n'a jamais été aussi facile. Vous pouvez lancer la diffusion de tous les médias vers DLNA ou Chromecast mème si votre appareil ne prend pas en charge le contenu. Vous pouvez lire un flux en ligne ou du contenu stocké localement. Duplex Media Player projettera tous type de médias vers tous les appareil même si le dispositif ne le prend pas en charge (par exemple, Chromecast ne supporte pas les fichiers FLV, avec Duplex Media Player cela devient possible tout comme d'autres fichiers vers d'autres appareils Chromecast )\r\n\r\nDe plus, si vous avez une connexion réseau lente, ou que votre contenu multimédia a été codé avec un bitrate élevé, donc trop lourd, ce qui ne convient pas pour une bonne fluidité, Duplex Media Player peut générer une copie plus légère et appropriée pour une lecture fluide et en douceur.\r\n\r\nSous-titres\r\n----------\r\nEn plus de charger des sous-titres locaux, Duplex Media Player peut automatiquement rechercher et télécharger les sous-titres pour vous. Vous pouvez également configurer l'apparence des sous-titres. Enfin, la fonction de correction du temps vous permettra d'ajuster les temps des sous-titres.\r\n\r\nEnregistrement\r\n------------\r\nAvec un seul Tap, vous pouvez démarrer et arrêter l'enregistrement facilement. Vous pouvez enregistrer des flux en direct et en ligne sur votre appareil à tout moment. Même si vous utilisez Pip. Vous pouvez faire enregistrer chaque lecteur séparément.\r\n\r\nAudio/Vidéo Codecs\r\n------------------------\r\nDuplex Media Player prend en charge tous les codecs vidéo/audio connus. Vous n'avez pas à installer de codecs externes. Si vous essayez de lire les .rm ou .flv ou tout autre format qui ne sont pas pris en charge dans Windows 10, alors Duplex Media Player est ce que vous recherchez.\r\n\r\n*** Toutes les fonctionnalités de cette application sont gratuites, à l'exception des fonctionnalités avancées (casting, téléchargement, enregistrement et lecture depuis les serveurs OneDrive et
